description: Listed building consent for the construction of single storey residential units on the site of existing garages abutting the curtilage listed boundary wall of the grade II listed properties 26-34 (consecutive) Northampton Square and the flank elevation of the Grade II listed property 19 Tompion Street.   Listed building consent for the construction of a single part single and part two storey residential units on the site of existing garages abutting the curtilage listed boundary wall of Grade II listed properties 25 Northampton Square and 5-10 Sebastian Street.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The development hereby permitted shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission. 

REASON: To comply with the provisions of Section 91(1)(a) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended by the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004 (Chapter 5).
